citations.desc: Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee (IACUC).
citations.narrative:
The reports for the semiannual reviews of the animal use program and facilities conducted in April 2023 and October
2022 were not signed by a majority of the IACUC members. In order to ensure the committee has the opportunity to
review the report and ensure minority views are represented, the report must be signed by a majority of the IACUC
members. Research registrants shall have the semiannual reports be reviewed and signed by a majority of the IACUC
members and must include any minority views.
Correct from this date forward of 23 August 2023.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representatives.
n

narrative:
2.31(c)(3) 
   
Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee (IACUC). 
The reports for the semiannual reviews of the animal use program and facilities conducted in April 2023 and October 
2022 were not signed by a majority of the IACUC members. In order to ensure the committee has the opportunity to 
review the report and ensure minority views are represented, the report must be signed by a majority of the IACUC 
members. Research registrants shall have the semiannual reports be reviewed and signed by a majority of the IACUC 
members and must include any minority views.  
 
Correct from this date forward of 23 August 2023. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representatives. 
 
 n
